title: Checkers AI
author: Jack Coy
author_tag: With help from students in COSC 461
subtitle: Play against an AI in this simple checkers GUI
description: I created this program as part of an Artificial Intelligence class that I took at Eastern Michigan University. We created a simple look ahead AI that was actually quite excellent at the first few moves of checkers, but failed to maintain its lead and was poor at finishing off an opponent. This project proved to be a lot of fun. Would love to do a remix of this using a deep neural net!
